channel.title: Photography on Charisse

item.title: Establishing a Classical Pianist's Online Presence
item.description: Overview Clarisse, a classical pianist, was looking for ways to increase her online presence. I designed a website for her to consolidate her musical material in one place, and to establish her personal brand. Existing Constraints Three barriers had prevented her from making a website herself: technical knowhow, cost, and time. She didn’t code, she was hesitant about committing to a hefty paid subscription, and, as a musician, she wanted to focus on making music.
